name: Loyal Jabber Robot
short_description: ljr - Loyal Jabber Robot is just an all-purpose robot for jabber groupchats with plugin system written in Java. Planned features: remembering facts, file server, kick/ban for vulgar words, reminder, dictionary/translation.
